QuestData.Title: A Trial of Might
QuestData.Description:
I owe you my gratitude for helping make me whole again, outsider. It is clear that you are worthy to take on the trials.
Go now into the vault. There you will find the archive for the first trial you must undertake.
I will meet you inside.
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the archive device to learn about the Trial of Might.
QuestData.RewardText: The trial is done, and you emerge victorious! $B$BIt is a great feat you have done here, but you are not through yet. Many great challenges await you on your path to the Aegis.

Objectives.Objective: Learn about the Trial of Might
